content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Furnace for Iron Plate Production at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace used to smelt iron ore and coal into iron plates.

### Copper Furnace for Copper Plate Production at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace used to smelt copper ore (with coal) into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Issues with get_entities:
  – When calling get_entities, avoid using unsupported keywords (e.g. “radius”) and supplying unexpected positional arguments.
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
  – Ensure a Lab is available in inventory before attempting placement.
  – Verify that all prerequisite ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are sufficiently available before initiating Lab crafting.
• Entity List Handling:
  – Confirm that functions returning entity collections do not yield None; if they might, default to an empty list before iterating.
